American Commitment president Phil Kerpen has been amassing a collection of Gruber videos, but some have been taken down quite recently.
— Phil Kerpen (@kerpen) November 18, 2014@kerpen oops…the video got scrubbed.
— Phil Kerpen (@kerpen) November 18, 2014@chrisrlloyd The exploiting one is from this speech.
